item.description:
RYSE energy clearing with Judy!
Wednesday, Jan. 19; $20 walk-in 7:00-8:30 p.m.
Note: Bring a friend new to RYSE and you both pay only $15

RYSE is a group energy clearing focusing on the chakras, aura, male/female balance and more. RYSE brings about your next level of harmony, health, clarity, creativity and wholeness. A mini talk before the clearing will let you know how the clearing works. Experience the difference when your energy systems are clear! People always feel great long after this deep clearing. It's so peaceful! To learn about more offerings at A Higher Balance go to www.AHigherBalance.com
item.name: RYSE Energy Clearing - get happy!
